![Introduction](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/IriDark/Valoria/refs/heads/main/src/main/resources/assets/valoria/textures/gui/title/introduction_banner.png)
**Valoria** is a Dark RPG overhaul mod that drags Minecraft into a world twisted by ancient myth and post-apocalyptic ruin. Inspired by real-world mythologies.

After the Elemental Collapse shattered the balance of reality, monstrous creatures emerged. Wander through cursed lands, awaken forbidden powers, and uncover what little hope remains beneath the ashes.

## Features
 - ‚öîÔ∏è Mobs, Bosses, huge weaponry, lots of building blocks and items ‚Äî all with vanilla-styled textures
 - üè∞ Structures, biomes and whole new Dimension full of secrets and danger
 - üìñ Deep lore rooted in mythology and built for exploration
 - üéµ Own OST written by [DuUaader](https://youtube.com/playlist?list=OLAK5uy_kTIzlCKrHm_RyFxoZPmnKZNccdCT6XL-c&si=0-No5jkq0tsd3neC)
 - ‚ò†Ô∏è Dark-fantasy and post-apocalyptic styled
